testCases.title: Verify user can navigate to Appointment Board
steps: Verify Appointment Board page loads successfully
testCases.expectedResult: Appointment Board page should be displayed with header and action buttons

testCases.title: Verify Appointment Board page elements are visible
steps: Verify New Appointment button is visible
testCases.expectedResult: All Appointment Board page elements should be visible

testCases.title: Verify user can create a new appointment
steps: Fill in all required appointment details
Verify appointment appears in the list
testCases.expectedResult: New appointment should be created successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can search for appointments
steps: Enter patient name in search field

testCases.title: Verify user can filter appointments by status
steps: Select a status from status filter dropdown
Verify only appointments with selected status are displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Appointments should be filtered by selected status

testCases.title: Verify user can edit an appointment
steps: Click Edit button on an existing appointment

testCases.title: Verify user can delete an appointment
steps: Click Delete button on an appointment
Verify appointment is removed from the list

testCases.title: Verify user can switch between different views
steps: Verify appointments are displayed in calendar format
Verify appointments are displayed in list format
testCases.expectedResult: User should be able to switch between different view modes

testCases.title: Verify user can confirm an appointment
steps: Click Confirm button on a scheduled appointment
Verify appointment status changes to Confirmed
testCases.expectedResult: Appointment status should be updated to Confirmed

testCases.title: Verify user can cancel an appointment
steps: Click Cancel button on an appointment
Verify appointment status changes to Cancelled

testCases.title: Verify user can reschedule an appointment
steps: Click Reschedule button on an appointment

testCases.title: Verify validation for required fields
testCases.expectedResult: Validation errors should be displayed for required fields

testCases.title: Verify user can filter appointments by provider
steps: Select a provider from provider filter dropdown
Verify only appointments for selected provider are displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Appointments should be filtered by selected provider

testCases.title: Verify user can refresh appointment list
testCases.expectedResult: Appointment list should be refreshed successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can clear search filters
testCases.expectedResult: Search filters should be cleared and all appointments displayed
